name: Traditional Mexican Molletes
author: Jenny Aleman
summary: A traditional Mexican open sandwich with refried beans and melted cheese served with salsa. Perfect for breakfast, lunch, or as a tasty snack.
ingredients: 4  bolillo rolls, sliced in half lengthwise
1 (7 ounce) package Borden® Southwestern Cheddar & Monterey Jack Shredded Cheese
Mexican salsa or pico de gallo, for serving
directions: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Line a rimmed baking sheet with parchment paper
Remove some of the bread from the middle of bread halves to accommodate more toppings
Spread about 1 teaspoon butter on each half
Spread 2 to 3 tablespoons warmed refried beans on bread
Sprinkle about 1/4 cup Borden® Cheddar and Monterey Jack shredded cheese on the beans
Place bread halves on prepared baking sheet
Bake in preheated oven until the cheese is melted and bubbly and the bread is crispy, 15 to 20 minutes
Top molletes with Mexican salsa or pico de gallo
